# Security & Authorization Domain Agent Contract

**Agent Name:** security-domain-agent  
**Domain:** Security  
**Authority Level:** Final on access control

## The Story Authoring Agent MAY
- Reference authorization checks
- Describe security boundaries

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST ASK WHEN
- RBAC is implied
- Cross-tenant behavior exists
- Sensitive data is involved

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST NOT
- Invent permission logic
- Assume encryption rules
